short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the website usage for Remotly productivity monitoring.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with the Remotly! This powerful Chrome extension seamlessly tracks the webpages you visit, and the time spent on each, providing insightful data to help you stay focused and efficient.

Features:

- Webpage Tracking: Automatically tracks the websites you visit.

- Time Management: Monitors the time spent on each webpage to give you a clear picture of your browsing habits.

- Productivity Insights: Integrates with the Remotly portal to provide detailed productivity reports and analytics.

- Privacy First: All data is securely processed and only used to help you improve your productivity.


How It Works:

1. Install the Remotly Extention from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Allow the necessary permissions for the extension to start tracking your activity.
3. Visit the Remotly portal to view your productivity insights and reports.

Stay on top of your tasks and maximize your productivity with Remotly Productivity Tracker!
